long_description: Be active and look great. The women's prAna Meme Pants get extra points for blending great style with an extra comfortable, practical and durable stretch fabric. Nylon/spandex fabric offers comfortable 2-way stretch and dries quickly. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. 5-pocket jean styling includes hand pockets with coin pocket and rear pockets with button flaps; plus, convenient side-leg cargo pockets. The women's prAna Meme Pants offer a slim, fitted design, skinny legs and a low rise. Closeout.
short_description: Be active and look great. The women's prAna Meme Pants get extra points for blending great style with an extra comfortable, practical and durable stretch fabric.
